Issue.creator: rennman
Issue.summary: CA sample in fabric-samples does not work with hyphens in orderer
Issue.description: , line 1: It requires adding an escaped set of double quotes: {{.channel_group.groups.Application.groups.'"$\{ORG}"'.values.MSP.value.config.revocation_list}} {{channel_group.groups.Application.groups.'"\"$\{ORG}\""'.values.MSP.value.config.revocation_list}} >
